head.title: Staff Builders Posts A $3.2 Million Loss

hedline.hl1: Staff Builders Posts A $3.2 Million Loss

abstract.p: Staff Builders of Lake Success, Long Island, medical staffing service, posts $3.2 million net loss for fiscal year ended February 29 and 21 percent increase in revenue (S)

block.p: Staff Builders of Lake Success, a medical staffing service (Nasdaq: SBLI), reported a net loss of $3.2 million, or 14 cents a share, for its fiscal year ended Feb. 29. Revenues rose 21 percent. The president, David Savitsky, said the loss came from restructuring efforts, including the spinoff of Tender Loving Care Services, which offers home health care.

Staff Builders of Lake Success, a medical staffing service (Nasdaq: SBLI), reported a net loss of $3.2 million, or 14 cents a share, for its fiscal year ended Feb. 29. Revenues rose 21 percent. The president, David Savitsky, said the loss came from restructuring efforts, including the spinoff of Tender Loving Care Services, which offers home health care.
''The spinoff of T.L.C.S. has enabled the investment community to separate us from the issues facing home health care providers,'' he said.
